projects.title: Password Generator
projects.subtitle: web application to generate random passwords.
projects.description: Web application for generating random passwords. The backend uses a package developed by me that creates passwords and returns them to the frontend when it sends a request. Users can register and log in securely thanks to the use of JWT to protect sessions and their data. Additionally, users have the option to save, edit or delete their generated passwords, as well as edit or delete their account.
